channel.title: A Well thought Out Tut for Changing the Login Box!
channel.description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ [size=24pt]List of Contents[/size] 1. Downloads 2. Finding the Cache - Changing the Images - Saving and Compiling. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=24pt]~~~~~~~~~~~~~DOWNLOADS!~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/size] *Toms Cache Suite Editor: [url=http://uppit.com/jo2tyiq7hghs/Cache_Suite.rar]http://uppit.com/jo2tyiq7hghs/Cache_Suite.rar[/url] GIMP (Optional) (Pro Image Editing Software you can Use any that you like Inc MSPaint.net): [url=http://www.gimp.org/windows/]http://www.gimp.org/windows/[/url] *WINRAR: [url=http://rarlab.com/]http://rarlab.com/[/url] Downloads with * (astrix) are Needed Downloads Unless you already have them. [size=24pt]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/size]
[size=24pt]~~~~~~~~~~~Guide~~~~~~~~~~~[/size] Section 1 OK so first up, After you have downloaded "Toms Cache Suite Editor" Make a New Folder Called "Cache Editor" or something like that, then put the .Rar Folder in there.
Section 2 Once your "WinRar" Download has Finished "Run" the Setup and Install it once that has finished, Then go back to the "Cache Editor" Folder then (Right Click) then (Click) "Extract here" once that has finished (Click) "Suite.Jar" and then At the top corner (Click) "File" Then "Load Cache" then (Scroll) "Up" in the "Look in" bar and (Click) "Desktop" or where-ever your Client Is Saved, then (Open) "Yoursevername's Client" And then (Single-Click) "Cache" then (Click) "Open" and then you have Found your Cache and have Opened it in "Cache Suite" then (click) "View/Edit Image Archives" then (Select) "Title" then (Click) "Titlebox.dat" then look at the Measurements, mine is "360 wide / 200 High"
Section 3 Then Open up "GIMP" or what ever you have, Make a Box with them Measurements and Design your Login Box, within them Parameters Once you have finished Save it as "Whatevernamehere.Png" but make sure you know where you have Saved it, Once finished go back to "Suite.jar" and (Click) "Import" at the Bottom of the TitleBox.dat Page, Then Find your Image, and Upload it, once done (Click) "Save Archive" and Then Restart your Client.
[size=24pt]Credits:[/size] 20% ExtremeX-Scape™ 30% Me For making the Effort to Type this up. 10% RARLAB (WinRAR), For the Use of their Software lol 10% The Creators of "GIMP" and what ever Image editor You used 30% Tom or what ever his name is for the Cache Suite.

@lilvamp11 wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:20, topic:404412”][quote author=lilvamp11 link=topic=501454.msg3675825#msg3675825 date=1311239265]

Could you learn when you are suppose to cap letters and when not to? I will make you a tutorial if that would help.

Soo you Judge People on their Grammar do you?, Much like you must Judge a Book by the Cover, and the Look by the lover, What an Asshole you are…

M8 Dont worry I am A christian and I Dont Judge like jesus Did Gr8 tut rep ++ will Read again

you have a Shift Finger Same as Me Dont Judge like jesus Did Gr8 See that shift finger
[/quote]He…Was…Trolling…Ya…

But all an all, Caps set behind me. Good tutorial, Looks really well thought out.[/quote]
Yeah, We Can Save the Fighting for Pvp in Private Servers, Also Some People Alot of People Has Problems, and Habits, Mines just A shift finger?

Read full topic

item.title: A Well thought Out Tut for Changing the Login Box!
item.dc:creator: @lilvamp11 lilvamp11
item.description:
@lilvamp11 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:3, topic:405155”][quote author=lilvamp11 link=topic=501454.msg3675198#msg3675198 date=1311202816]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=501454.msg3675184#msg3675184 date=1311201852]

[quote author=lilvamp11 link=topic=501454.msg3674683#msg3674683 date=1311178326]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=501454.msg3673739#msg3673739 date=1311113569]

No, Im not Retarded, I just have a Habbit, cause i Script in Lua / HTML, in Lua you need a Cap no matter where in a line it is, if it is a Function you need a Cap soo it’s just a Habbit of mine now, and I can’t get out of it… soo get used to it.
[/quote]I program with HTML as well, I never had that issue? I just guess I know when to use it and when not too, I must just be smarter then you
[/quote] no it’s the simple fact of coding with both lua and HTML almost 10 hours a day, when you get so used to it, it becomes a Habit, And also, you must be dumber then me actually since Every single Famous smart person has a HABIT/DISABILITY, so get used to it…
[/quote]Well that may be, But not every single famous person types like they got a shift happy finger, I believe that’s just you. Also how old are you anyways, You act as if you are 10?

Hmm my age is on my Profile, Go there to find out…
[/quote]A normal fifteen-year-old wouldn’t be as stupid as you.[/quote]
thats Because no NORMAL 15 yr old makes/Plays rsps’s and plays Runescape…

Read full topic

item.title: A Well thought Out Tut for Changing the Login Box!
item.dc:creator: @lilvamp11 lilvamp11
item.description:
@lilvamp11 wrote:

[quote=“dain bramage, post:2, topic:404412”]You don’t need to compile. Your cache is loaded when you start the client; it’s never compiled. Plus, why would you be compiling your server? :P.

Rep++ though, for the good tut.[/quote]
thanks for the Rep, also I change it to “Reboot Client”

Read full topic
item.source: A Well thought Out Tut for Changing the Login Box!

item.title: A Well thought Out Tut for Changing the Login Box!
item.dc:creator: @dain_bramage dain bramage
item.description:
@dain_bramage wrote:

You don’t need to compile. Your cache is loaded when you start the client; it’s never compiled. Plus, why would you be compiling your server? :P.

Rep++ though, for the good tut.

Read full topic
item.source: A Well thought Out Tut for Changing the Login Box!

item.title: A Well thought Out Tut for Changing the Login Box!
item.dc:creator: @lilvamp11 lilvamp11
item.description:
@lilvamp11 wrote:

[size=24pt]List of Contents[/size]
1. Downloads
2. Finding the Cache - Changing the Images - Saving and Compiling.

[size=24pt]~DOWNLOADS!~[/size]
*Toms Cache Suite Editor: http://uppit.com/jo2tyiq7hghs/Cache_Suite.rar
GIMP (Optional) (Pro Image Editing Software you can Use any that you like Inc MSPaint.net): http://www.gimp.org/windows/
*WINRAR: http://rarlab.com/
Downloads with * (astrix) are Needed Downloads Unless you already have them.
[size=24pt]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/size]

[size=24pt]~Guide~[/size]
Section 1
OK so first up, After you have downloaded “Toms Cache Suite Editor” Make a New Folder Called “Cache Editor” or something like that, then put the .Rar Folder in there.

Section 2
Once your “WinRar” Download has Finished “Run” the Setup and Install it once that has finished, Then go back to the “Cache Editor” Folder then (Right Click) then (Click) “Extract here” once that has finished (Click) “Suite.Jar” and then At the top corner (Click) “File” Then “Load Cache” then (Scroll) “Up” in the “Look in” bar and (Click) “Desktop” or where-ever your Client Is Saved, then (Open) “Yoursevername’s Client” And then (Single-Click) “Cache” then (Click) “Open” and then you have Found your Cache and have Opened it in “Cache Suite” then (click) “View/Edit Image Archives” then (Select) “Title” then (Click) “Titlebox.dat” then look at the Measurements, mine is “360 wide / 200 High”

Section 3
Then Open up “GIMP” or what ever you have, Make a Box with them Measurements and Design your Login Box, within them Parameters Once you have finished Save it as “Whatevernamehere.Png” but make sure you know where you have Saved it, Once finished go back to “Suite.jar” and (Click) “Import” at the Bottom of the TitleBox.dat Page, Then Find your Image, and Upload it, once done (Click) “Save Archive” and Then Restart your Client.

[size=24pt]Credits:[/size]
20% ExtremeX-Scape™
30% Me For making the Effort to Type this up.
10% RARLAB (WinRAR), For the Use of their Software lol
10% The Creators of “GIMP” and what ever Image editor You used
30% Tom or what ever his name is for the Cache Suite.

Read full topic
item.source: A Well thought Out Tut for Changing the Login Box!
